attr.title: Plague
attr.desc: PLAGUE is heavily inspired on Gargoyle's Quest for the original Gameboy. It's a platformer where you can control a plague doctor, throwing explosive potions and dashing mid-air.
attr.inst: Download free on itch.io https://foletto.itch.io/plague -Locate data.win, and .ogg file then place inside gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download free on [itch.io](https://foletto.itch.io/plague) -Locate data.win, and .ogg file then place inside gamedata folder.
